article: When Mr. Hunt woke up in the morning, he felt his bedroom was very bright. He thought he  _  to turn off the light again. He sat up and tried to do that. And now he  _  it was the sunlight. Mr. Hunt went to see their daughter in the city two days ago. She cooked some food for him  _  he left. But Mr. Hunt hoped to have breakfast in a restaurant near the park. And then he could walk  _  the lake. He put on his clothes and went out. The sun was shining brightly in the sky and the  _  was fresh . But people were busy and he could see only some old people and children. He went in the restaurant and sat down at a table, waiting for the  _  . "Hi, Peter!" someone called him and he saw it was his  _  Richard. "Hi, Richard. Glad to meet you here." "Glad to meet you, too," said Richard. "I'm sorry , but I  _  my wallet at home . So could you lend fifty dollars to me, please?" "Sure, but I have only twenty five dollars in my  _  ." "It doesn't matter ," said Richard , " then you'll owe me twenty-five dollars and I'll owe you  _  dollars , too . That'll be fair ."
